(\{ "visitors", "\

1 Denar\\\r\\ndark red, red\\r\\n\

2 Denarii\\\r\\nblood-red, blush-red, bright red, crimson, light red, maroon, ruddy red, vibrant red\\r\\n\

(\{ "visitors", "\
\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\Embroideries\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\Houses \& Guilds\\\\r\\n\
\Armaments\\\\r\\n\
\Fauna\\\\r\\n\
\Flora\\\\r\\n\
\Geometric\\\\r\\n\
\Miscellaneous\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\
\Houses \& Guilds\\\\r\\n\
Constabulary Crest\\\r\\nThe left side of this garment bears three seashells on a (thread) shield, with two spears crossed behind.\\r\\n\
\
\\r\\n\
Octogram\\\r\\nThe fabric has been embroidered in (thread) thread with the Octogram of Creation representing the Church of S'allumer.\\r\\n\
\
\\r\\n\
Seashell\\\r\\nThe three seashells representing the Rinaldi are embroidered here in (thread) thread.\\r\\n\
\
\\r\\n\
Tower\\\r\\nThe castle tower representing the Doloreaux is embroidered here in (thread) thread.\\r\\n\
\
\\r\\n\
Windmill\\\r\\nThe windmill representing the Bisclavret is embroidered here in (thread) thread.\\r\\n\
\
\\r\\n\\[Top]\\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\
\Armaments\\\\r\\n\
Shield\\\r\\nThe seams of this garment are lined with miniature (thread) shields.\\r\\n\
\
\\r\\n\
Sword\\\r\\nThe seams of this garment are lined with miniature (thread) swords.\\r\\n\
\
\\r\\n\\[Top]\\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\
\Fauna\\\\r\\n\
Destrier\\\r\\nThe rearing destrier representing the Avoirdupois is embroidered here in (thread) thread.\\r\\n\
\
\\r\\n\
Fish\\\r\\nThe seams of this garment are lined with miniature (thread) fish.\\r\\n\
\
\\r\\n\
Skink\\\r\\nA lone (thread) skink crouches upon the backside of the garment.\\r\\n\
\
\\r\\n\
Snake\\\r\\nThe seams of this garment are lined with miniature (thread) snakes.\\r\\n\
\
\\r\\n\
Spider\\\r\\nThe fabric boasts a crouching spider depicted in (thread) thread.\\r\\n\
\
\\r\\n\
Turtle Dove\\\r\\nA pair of (thread) turtle doves face each other while resting peacefully on a decorative branch.\\r\\n\
\
\\r\\n\\[Top]\\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\
\Flora\\\\r\\n\
Apple Blossom\\\r\\nApple blossoms delicately strung in (thread) display their many petals, with each flower spaced strategically throughout the garment.\\r\\n\
\
\\r\\n\
Autumn Leaf\\\r\\nDancing (thread) autumn leaves scatter along the seams of the garment playfully.\\r\\n\
\
\\r\\n\
Flower\\\r\\nThe material has been embroidered in (thread) thread to depict a myriad of clusters and single, detailed flowers.\\r\\n\
\
\\r\\n\
Poppy\\\r\\nLarge (thread) poppy flowers are scattered liberally across the garment.\\r\\n\
\
\\r\\n\\[Top]\\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\
\Geometric\\\\r\\n\
Criss-Cross\\\r\\nCriss-cross (thread) patterns etch a curious design along the length of the garment.\\r\\n\
\
\\r\\n\
Dot\\\r\\nThe seams of this garment are lined with miniature (thread) dots.\\r\\n\
\
\\r\\n\
Geometric\\\r\\nSimplistic (thread) threading covers the front of the garment in a geometric design.\\r\\n\
\
\\r\\n\
Heart\\\r\\nThe seams of this garment are lined with miniature (thread) hearts.\\r\\n\
\
\\r\\n\
Knot\\\r\\nKnots and crosses spatter the material in (thread) thread.\\r\\n\
\
\\r\\n\
Wave\\\r\\nRibbon worked (thread) waves dominate the body of the garment.\\r\\n\
\
\\r\\n\
X\\\r\\nThe seams of this garment are lined with miniature (thread) X's.\\r\\n\
\
\\r\\n\\[Top]\\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\
\Miscellaneous\\\\r\\n\
Fist\\\r\\nThe fabric has been embroidered in (thread) thread with a strong fist.\\r\\n\
\
\\r\\n\
Skull\\\r\\nAn accurately detailed skull is displayed in (thread) thread on the backside of the garment.\\r\\n\
\
\\r\\n\
Smoke\\\r\\nDelicate wisps of threaded (thread) smoke radiate over the garment in circular patterns.\\r\\n\
\
\\r\\n\
Wheel\\\r\\nThe seams of this garment are lined with miniature (thread) eight spoked wheels.\\r\\n\
\
\\r\\n\\[Top]\\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\r\\n\" \})

(\{ "visitors", "\
\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\r\\n\\\r\\n\

(\{ "visitors", "\
\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\r\\n\\\r\\nPlease see the drop-down menu above for dyes, embroideries, fabrics, fittings, and patterns.\\r\\n\", (\{ "page", "Main Page", "default" \}) \})

(\{ "visitors", "\
\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\Patterns\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\Belts\\\\r\\n\
\Capes \& Cloaks\\\\r\\n\
\Dresses \& Gowns\\\\r\\n\
\Footwear\\\\r\\n\
\Gloves\\\\r\\n\
\Headwear\\\\r\\n\
\Pants\\\\r\\n\
\Pouches\\\\r\\n\
\Shirts\\\\r\\n\
\Skirts\\\\r\\n\
\Socks, Stockings, \& Hose\\\\r\\n\
\Underthings\\\\r\\n\
\Miscellaneous\\\\r\\n\
\Linens\\\\r\\n\
\Add-Ons\\\\r\\n\
\Dolls\\\\r\\n\
\Flowers\\\\r\\n\
\Masks\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\r\\n\
\Belts\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Belt\\\r\\nA belt made of (fabric). Worn wrapped about the waist, it can be used for hanging various items such as pouches and scabbards. \\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Braided Belt\\\r\\nA braided belt made of (fabric). This is a casual belt created through the braiding together of three or more strips of fabric.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Shoulder Sash\\\r\\nA (fabric) shoulder sash. It is designed to be worn diagonally across the chest from shoulder to hip. \\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Tie belt\\\r\\nA (fabric) tie belt. This is a strip of fabric generally used for keeping a robe closed.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\[Top]\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\r\\n\
\Capes \& Cloaks\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Capelet\\\r\\nA (fabric) capelet. This is a miniature cape designed to be worn during warm weather. Barely covering the shoulders in the front, the top rests just under the nape of the wearer in the back to fashionably frame the neckline.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Chasuble Cape\\\r\\nA (fabric) chasuble cape. This is a generic, circular cape with an aperture for the head.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Cloak\\\r\\nA (fabric) cloak. It is a type of loose garment that is worn over indoor clothing and protects the wearer from the cold, rain or wind, or it may form part of a fashionable outfit or uniform.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Evening Cape\\\r\\nA (fabric) evening cape. This is a sleeveless outer garment which is designed to fasten at the throat and fall down the back of the wearer. Worn as a formal garment, this particular cape is meant to be made from fine materials only, sometimes being constructed from lacy knit patterns or crochets, and occasionally beaded or laced with gems. It falls only partially down the back, and drapes elegantly over the shoulders.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Lacerna Cloak\\\r\\nA (fabric) lacerna cloak. A large, semi-circular cloak draped around the shoulder, down the back and typically secured with a piece of jewelry. It serves as protection against the elements.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\[Top]\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\r\\n\
\Dresses \& Gowns\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Dress\\\r\\nA (fabric) dress. It's a long-sleeved garment for females fitted close to the upper part of the body, with flowing skirts extending to the floor.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Gown\\\r\\nA (fabric) gown. This article of clothing is made up of a bodice and skirt sewn together at the waist. It fastens down the front with ribbon ties.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Peplem\\\r\\nA (fabric) peplem. A tubular female garment featuring a long, basic skirt that comes around the body under the arms, and is often pinned at one or each shoulder with a clasp.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Round Kirtle\\\r\\nA (fabric) round kirtle. This is a sleeveless, shapeless gown that falls into a full flare toward the ground. Three wide bands of ribbon decorate the bottom of the garment, concealing the wearer's feet in entirety.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Sleeveless Undergown\\\r\\nA (fabric) sleeveless undergown. Shaped much like a strapless evening gown, this sleeveless undergown features a short, fitted bodice which controls the bustline and fillins in the front of the overgown without gapping. The bodice laces up the back for a snug fit, and has an attached A-line skirt which can be seen when the hem of the overgown is lifted.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Wrap-Around Dress\\\r\\nA (fabric) wrap-around dress. A primitive female garment in which a large swath of cloth is wrapped about one side of the body and then the other to create a V-necked, dress-like garment. It bears no sleeves and has the most basic of skirts which drags across the ground as the wearer walks.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\[Top]\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\r\\n\
\Footwear\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Ankle-High Boots\\\r\\nA pair of (fabric) ankle-high boots. These boots reach just to to the ankle and tie securely via lacing on the side. They feature padded soles for added comfort. \\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Boots\\\r\\nA pair of (fabric) boots. These are tailored so they fit over most animals paws. Custom shoes are available to hooved animals such as horses, or animals with strangely shaped feet. \\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Calf-High Boots\\\r\\nA pair of (fabric) calf-high boots. These boots reach just to to the calf and are accented by a series of fashionable buttons and laces. The interior is complimented with a plush lining and padded sole, ensuring these boots are comfortable, all day pieces of apparel.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Footwraps\\\r\\nA pair of (fabric) footwraps. Primitive protective wrappings that are bound around the feet of the wearer to encase the base of the toes all the way up to the calves.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Knee-High Boots\\\r\\nA pair of (fabric) knee-high boots. These boots reach just to the knee and close via three side strap enclosures with ties. The interior features a padded sole for comfort.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Knee-High Moccasins\\\r\\nA pair of (fabric) knee-high moccasins. This heelless shoe features a soft and flexible sole which is brought up the sides of the foot and over the toes where it is joined by a puckered seam to a U-shaped piece lying on top of the foot. The upper part of the footwear reaches to just below the knees, and is often adorned with embroidery, beading, or other ornaments.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Latchet Shoes\\\r\\nA pair of (fabric) latchet shoes. This footwear bears a round toe and extends to just above the ankle where a thong or strap is used to attach it securely to the wearer.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Moccasins\\\r\\nA pair of (fabric) moccasins. This heelless shoe features a soft and flexible sole which is brought up the sides of the foot and over the toes where it is joined by a puckered seam to a U-shaped piece lying on top of the foot. The upper part of the footwear is often adorned with embroidery, beading, or other ornaments.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Round-Toed Shoes\\\r\\nA pair of (fabric) round-toed shoes. Simple, slipper-like shoes which slide onto the feet. They feature a low top-cut, and rounded toes.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Sandals\\\r\\nA pair of (fabric) sandals. Designed for warm weather wear, each shoe is made from a single piece of sturdy fabric seamlessly attached to a sole designed for comfort. The toe area is open, with adjustable criss-crossing lacing covering the top of the foot and extending just past the ankles.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Shoes\\\r\\nA pair of (fabric) shoes. These are tailored so they fit over most animal's paws. They cover the foot and extend just to the ankle when pulled up. Custom shoes are available to hooved animals such as horses, or animals with strangely shaped feet. \\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Slippers\\\r\\nA pair of (fabric) slippers. Pointed toe shoes that easily slip on and off the foot. They feature a barely noticeable heel, half cuffs in the back, and double lacing on the top sides for a secure fit.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Strapped Boots\\\r\\nA pair of (fabric) strapped boots. Footwear reaching just to the knees which is held in place by a myriad of primitive strings and straps wrapped about the circumference.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\[Top]\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\r\\n\
\Gloves\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Armwraps\\\r\\nA (fabric) pair of armwraps. Primitive wrappings that are bound around the upper arms of the wearer for decoration.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Gloves\\\r\\nA pair of (fabric) gloves. These are tailored so they fit over most animals paws. Custom fingerless gloves are available for clawed animals who need such things. \\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Handwraps\\\r\\nA pair of (fabric) handwraps. Primitive protective wrappings that are bound around the hands of the wearer to encase the base of the fingers down to the wrists.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Mittens\\\r\\nA pair of (fabric) mittens. These are tailored so they fit over most animal's paws and stretch just over the wrists. They bundle the hands entirely to provide warmth during the cold seasons, and, unlike regular gloves, do not have a separate sheath for each finger. Custom fingerless gloves are available for clawed animals who need such things.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Moufles\\\r\\nA pair of (fabric) moufles. Extensions of sleeves which cover the hands to provide warmth and maintain modesty.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Work Gloves\\\r\\nA pair of (fabric) work gloves. These are tailored so they fit over most animal's paws and extend upward over the forearms for protection. Custom fingerless gloves are available for clawed animals who need such things.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\[Top]\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\r\\n\
\Headwear\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Acorn Hat\\\r\\nA (fabric) acorn hat. It is a somewhat rounded hat tapering upward into a blunt point.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Benda\\\r\\nA (fabric) benda. This is a length of material used for covering, wrapping around, or intertwining with the hair.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Beret\\\r\\nA (fabric) beret. It is a soft round cap, usually of wool or felt, with a flat crown, which is worn by both men and women.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Beribboned Garland\\\r\\nA (fabric) beribboned garland. It is an elaborately woven circular ribbon arrangement, which is worn upon a woman's head primarily to hold the hair or veil in place. Pretty, fluttering ribbons hang loosely off the back of the garland.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Bonnet\\\r\\nA (fabric) bonnet. This headwear is primarily worn by women and is knitted, and tied under the chin. It covers the hair, ears and back of the head, but not the forehead. Cut atop the bonnet are small slits, allowing for women to comfortably slide their ears through.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Cap\\\r\\nA (fabric) cap. It is a form of headgear. Caps have crowns that fit closer than hats and have no brim or only a visor. They are typically designed for warmth and, when including a visor, blocking sunlight from the eyes.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Circlet\\\r\\nA (fabric) circlet. It's a ring or band which is worn upon a woman's head, primarily to hold the hair or a veil in place.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Flat Cap\\\r\\nA (fabric) flat cap. It is a rounded men's cap with a small stiff brim in front.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Hood\\\r\\nA (fabric) hood. It is a kind of headgear that covers most of the head and neck and sometimes the face.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Nebulae Headdress\\\r\\nA (fabric) nebulae headdress. A narrow, halo-shaped headdress, traditionally made from gauze.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Paste\\\r\\nA (fabric) paste. This is a strip of cloth primarily used for being secured over a coif. \\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Phrygian Cap\\\r\\nA (fabric) phrygian cap. It is a soft, conical cap with the top pulled forward, and usually the color red.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Skullcap\\\r\\nA (fabric) skullcap. This is a small, circular cap, often with a small bit of cloth in the center looking like the tip of a beret.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Sock Hat\\\r\\nA (fabric) sock hat. This hat is similar in shape to the sock. It rests slackly about the head and the excess materials are draped to either side as the wearer prefers.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Zucchetto\\\r\\nA (fabric) zucchetto. Also called pileolus, it is a small skullcap worn by clerics of the Church. It was adopted for practical reasons to keep the clergy's tonsured heads warm in cold, damp churches. It consists of eight panels sewn together, with a stem at the top. The zucchetto continues to be worn while the mitre is being worn; it is placed inside it (a mitre is bottomless, so the zucchetto sits on the head while the mitre is around it).\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\[Top]\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\r\\n\
\Pants\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Pantaloons\\\r\\nA pair of (fabric) pantaloons. These are baggy trousers extending from waist to ankle.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Pants\\\r\\nA pair of (fabric) pants. An article of clothing covering the body from the waist down, with separate coverings for each leg that extend to the ankles. They are usually closed and fastened by either buttons or a laces, though straps with buckles or brooches are also commonplace.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Shorts\\\r\\nA pair of (fabric) shorts. These are trousers that end at or above the knee, generally worn by men.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\[Top]\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\r\\n\
\Pouches\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Pouch\\\r\\nA (fabric) pouch. It is wrapped around the waist with a string. \\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Purse\\\r\\nA (fabric) purse. A feminine variation of the pouch generally decorated with tasseled strings which can be tightly cinched. It can wrap around the waist if enough fabric is provided, or drape from the waist on a belt.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\[Top]\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\r\\n\
\Shirts\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Cavalier Shirt\\\r\\nA (fabric) cavalier shirt. A male garment featuring full sleeves, gathered cuffs, and a stiffened collar with a lace front closure.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Cropped Shirt\\\r\\nA (fabric) cropped shirt. An off-the-shoulder, low-cut female garment which has been cropped just beneath the breasts and hugs their lower halves tightly.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Gypsy Shirt\\\r\\nA (fabric) gypsy shirt. A men's straight cut shirt with full sleeves and a v-neck turned back collar.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Half-Shirt\\\r\\nA (fabric) half-shirt. A male upper body garment that wraps about the torso and drapes over one shoulder to leave half the chest exposed.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Strip of Cloth\\\r\\nA (fabric) strip of cloth. A crude upper body garment designed to cover a woman's breasts and little else. It ties simplistically around the back. \\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Shirt\\\r\\nA (fabric) shirt. This is a garment for the upper part of the body, with a collar, sleeves, and a front opening. \\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Swatch Shirt\\\r\\nA (fabric) swatch shirt. A female upper body garment in which two swatches of fabric have been tied together on each side of the body to serve as a covering for the breasts. It reaches to just above the navel.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\[Top]\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\r\\n\
\Skirts\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Overskirt\\\r\\nA (fabric) overskirt. A lower body garment hanging from the waist and worn over skirts by females.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Skirt\\\r\\nA (fabric) skirt. A garment hanging from the waist and worn by females.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Short Skirt\\\r\\nA (fabric) short skirt. A super short female garment that hangs from the waist to cover only the groin and uppermost portions of the legs.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Underskirt\\\r\\nA (fabric) underskirt. A full skirt which hangs from the waist. It is intended to be worn either beneath gowns or other skirts to grant a fuller look.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Waist Wrap\\\r\\nA (fabric) waist wrap. A unisex, skirt-like garment in which the fabric has been wrapped about the waist and centrally cinched or gathered in the front to cover the necessities. Any remaining cloth is left hanging between the legs to flutter freely toward the ground.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\[Top]\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\r\\n\
\Socks, Stockings, \& Hose\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Hose\\\r\\nA pair of (fabric) hose. The most traditional style of male hose extending downward from the waist and encapsulating each of the feet. They are most commonly worn with dress shoes or other varieties of footwear outside boots.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Knee-High Stockings\\\r\\nA pair of (fabric) knee-high stockings. These fitted stockings extend to just above the knee.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Leggings\\\r\\nA pair of (fabric) leggings. A leg covering usually extending from the ankle to the knee and often made of material such as leather or canvas, worn especially by soldiers and workers.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Socks\\\r\\nA pair of (fabric) socks. Tubes of fabric that cover the feet up to the ankle. Special socks can be crafted for those with bigger feet or hooves.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Stockings\\\r\\nA pair of (fabric) stockings. A stocking, (also known as hose), is a close-fitting, variously elastic garment covering the foot and lower part of the leg.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\[Top]\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\r\\n\
\Underthings\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Bikini Bra\\\r\\nA (fabric) bikini bra. It wraps around the chest, and is supportive enough to allow swimming.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Bikini Bottom\\\r\\nA (fabric) bikini bottom. Underpants or swimmers that reach to the hips rather than to the waist.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Bloomers\\\r\\nA pair of (fabric) bloomers. An undergarment which is full cut and extending to just below the knee with a simple ruffle. Embodying comfort and femininity, they are made to wear under most any article of clothing.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Chemise\\\r\\nA (fabric) chemise. It is a loose dresslike undergarment, flowing from the shoulder nearly to the feet, with voluminous sleeves. It is a simple garment worn close to the skin beneath other clothing to protect against bodily oils.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Underdrawers\\\r\\nA pair of (fabric) underdrawers. Beginning at the waist and extending downward to the knee, these male undergarments serve as a separate lining to breeches and other pants, aiding in preservation of over garments and adding an additional layer of warmth.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\[Top]\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\r\\n\
\Miscellaneous\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Bookmark\\\r\\nA (fabric) bookmark. It is a thin marker used to keep one's place in a book and so be able to return to it with ease.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Choker\\\r\\nA (fabric) choker. This is a collar that fastens around the neck.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Empty Bouquet\\\r\\nThis empty bouquet is bound with a ribbon.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Footed Pajamas\\\r\\nA pair of (fabric) footed pajamas. This is a pair of basic pajamas complete with foot coverings. Designed for comfort and warmth while sleeping, these pajamas are traditionally worn by infants and children.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Loincloth\\\r\\nA (fabric) loincloth. A garment designed for wrapping around the waist to cover the genitals. Usually a simple piece of cloth which is left to dangle downwards, it is a basic, primitive garment.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Ribbon\\\r\\nA (fabric) ribbon. This thin length of fabric is used for binding things such as the hair, both for decoration and to hold the object in place.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Robe\\\r\\nA (fabric) robe. The loose-fitting robe boasts full, wide sleeves and reaches to the ground to completely cover the wearer. This garment is normally a mark of a humble demeanor and great accomplishments. It is usually earned via religious, magical or other secretive means.\
\\r\\nIt comes complete with a long tailed hood and a corded waist. The hood hangs loose against the upper back.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Scarf\\\r\\nA (fabric) scarf. It is a piece of fabric worn on or near the head or around the neck for warmth, cleanliness, fashion or for religious reasons.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Streamers\\\r\\nSome (fabric) streamers, designed to be used as a decoration for socials and other events.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Tail Warmer\\\r\\nA (fabric) tail warmer. A circular tube of cloth designed to encompass the tail and protect it from the elements. It looks really comfy and warm.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Tippets\\\r\\nA pair of (fabric) tippets. Delicate, decorative streamers which are tied on to hang from the elbows of sleeves.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Wristlet\\\r\\nA (fabric) wristlet. This is a decorative band of fabric worn about the wrist. Pendants can be added to make it more decorative, or it can be worn alone as a simple accessory.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\[Top]\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\r\\n\
\Linens\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Beach Towel\\\r\\nA (fabric) beach towel. An oversized absorbent square cloth capable of covering even the largest of bodies. It is designed for drying oneself after a bath or a dip in the water, and can be used for laying out on the beach or grass.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Cloth\\\r\\nA clean cloth made from a confiscated scrap of (fabric).\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Hand Towel\\\r\\nA (fabric) hand towel. An absorbent, rectangular piece of cloth designed for cleaning up messes.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Handkerchief\\\r\\nA (fabric) handkerchief. A simple, square piece of cloth used for dabbing one's lips, wiping sweat from the brow, or giving as a token of favor.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Napkin\\\r\\nA (fabric) napkin. A square piece of cloth used at a meal to wipe the fingers or lips and to protect garments.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Polishing Cloth\\\r\\nA (fabric) polishing cloth. It is a square-cut piece of cloth intended for use in polishing metals and other precious items.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Portiere\\\r\\nA (fabric) portiere. A portiere, also known as a door curtain, is a hanging placed over a door or over the doorless entrance to a room.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Tablecloth\\\r\\nA (fabric) tablecloth. A large, square covering generally spread out over a table, especially during meals.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Tapestry\\\r\\nA tapestry, ready to have something embroidered on it.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Towel\\\r\\nA (fabric) fluffy towel. A fluffy and absorbent square cloth capable of covering an average-sized body. It is designed for drying oneself after a bath or a dip in the water.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Washcloth\\\r\\nA (fabric) washcloth. A small, square, and fluffy piece of cloth designed for washing the body or cleaning up messes.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\[Top]\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\r\\n\
\Add-Ons\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Fringe\\\r\\nSome (fabric) fringe, suitable to be added to clothing. It is a decorative border hanging loosely from a raveled edge.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Lace\\\r\\nSome (fabric) lace, suitable to be added to clothing. Lace is typically very expensive, and therefore is a mark of wealth.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
Trimming\\\r\\nSome (fabric) trimming, suitable to be added to clothing. Trimming is usually made from offcuts from finer garments, or from small amounts of valuable materials.\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\[Top]\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\r\\n\
\Dolls\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\nape, badger, bear, boar, carnation, cat, crow, daisy, dog, dragon, fox, horse, kitten, lily, mermaid, pigeon, puppy, rabbit, skink, tulip, vulture, wolf\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\[Top]\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\r\\n\
\Flowers\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\namaranthus, carnation, daisy, lily, lotus, marigold, orchid, poppy, rose, sunflower\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\[Top]\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\r\\n\
\Masks\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\\\r\\n\\\r\\nape, badger, bear, boar, carnation, cat, crow, daisy, dog, dragon, fox, horse, kitten, lily, pigeon, puppy, rabbit, skink, tulip, vulture, wolf\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\[Top]\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\r\\n\" \})
